mapper.select: SELECT p.*, c.customer_name_kor, t.trip_name, t.trip_date FROM purchase p LEFT JOIN customer c ON p.buyer_no = c.customer_no LEFT JOIN trip t ON p.trip_no = t.trip_no
SELECT p.*, c.customer_name_kor, t.trip_name, t.trip_date FROM purchase p LEFT JOIN customer c ON p.buyer_no = c.customer_no LEFT JOIN trip t ON p.trip_no = t.trip_no WHERE p.trip_no = #{trip_no}
